name: Defensive Arsenal
description:
Defensive Arsenal is a Sci-fi space themed, turn-based tower defense game where your defend you base against endless waves of enemies for as long as possible!

Enemies follow an AI pathfinding system across the map to find the shortest path to your base! Place turrets in strategic locations to make the enemies find a different route. Upgrade your defenses for maximum efficiency! And don't forget to watch out for all three enemy spawn points!

Background from Unity Asset Store by: Hedgehog Team

Sound effects from Zapsplat.com
